params.amount: The amount of funds to deposit.
The amount of funds to withdraw. Will fail if the liquidity provider does not have enough funds.

FEE().notice: The percentage fee that is charged on flash loans. It is important to note that this is a "mantissa", which means that it is scaled by 1e18. So, a fee of 100% would actually be 1e18. A fee of 5% would be 0.05e18.

TOKEN().notice: The address of the ERC20 contract.

borrow(uint256,address).notice: Borrow funds from the flash lender contract.

collectFees().notice: Retrieve the fees that have been collected.

constructor.notice: Set up the flash lender contract.

deposit(uint256).notice: Deposit funds into the flash lender contract.

withdraw(uint256).notice: Withdraw funds from the flash lender contract.

@notice Set up the flash lender contract.
